dc.title: NOAA NRC: Norfolk Regional Center
dc.description: The Norfolk Regional Center (NRC), hosted by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), is one of four Administrative Support Centers in the Department of Commerce (DOC). NRC provides administrative services to the following DOC organizations along the east coast of the United States: NOAA, International Trade Administration, Minority Business Development Agency, Bureau of Export Administration, and Economic Development Administration.
